column4: hi im newbie, i instaled ubuntu 7.04 and force AILGX , installed some codecs and multimedia progs, nvidia driver on restricted controller or something, but my CPU runs with 70% to 90% when i open system monitor and the interface is a little bit slow the mouse sometimes doesnt respond well and in the monitor sometimes appear black and white lines, video or works very slow like lag too, or crashes a already run forums and no answers...
my pc is a laptop sony vaio fs315s 1gb memory Geforce Go 6400 128mb.. ;P
I don't know that i can help you too much, but if you can track down the application that is eating your CPU that might help resolve it.
